attributes.action: Require OfCom to provide a simple nuisance call phone number.
attributes.background: Require OfCom to provide a simple phone number (like 1471) where phone users can report the previous call as a scam, abuse, or other nuisance, for immediate police investigation. If two separate users complain, the number would be automatically blocked on all exchanges.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for OFCOM. You can find out more about how to complain about a nuisance call here: 

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/phones-telecoms-and-internet/how-to-report-a-complaint/nuisance-calls-and-messages
